content: मालः {@--1@} <ab>N.</ab> of a district in the west or south-west of Bengal. {@--2@} <ab>N.</ab> of a tribe of barbarians, a mountaineer. {@--3@} <ab>N.</ab> of Viṣṇu. --लं {@--1@} A field. {@--2@} A high ground, rising or elevated ground (मालमुन्नतभूतलं); क्षेत्रमारुह्य मालं <ls>Me. 16</ls> (शैलप्रायमुन्नतस्थलं <ls>Malli.</ls>). {@--3@} A wood near a village. {@--4@} Fraud, deceit.
